constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: NEIPOL Name: MC1  Maldens and Coombe
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 2x front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion
decision_conditions: The erection of hip to gable and rear dormer roof extensions and installation of 2x front rooflights to facilitate loft conversion falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class B and C of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Your attention is drawn to the fact that planning permission does not override property rights and any ancient rights of light that may exist. This permission does not empower you to enter onto land not in your ownership without the specific consent of the owner. If you require further information or advice, you should consult a solicitor.

Please may we ask that you complete the submitted application form with the address, so that this information is viewable to the public when consultation comences. In addition we would appreciate if the proposed drawings could be sent to us in PDF format

Inspection:Site inspection carried out as a desktop exercise with information provided by the applicant as supporting material to application.Assessment:Appropriate minor works with no adverse impact upon tree health or public amenity.Recommendation:No objections.
